edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.managers

Class ActiveProjectileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.managers.ActiveProjectileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class ActiveProjectileManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Singleton class that stores and manages information of active projectiles in a pool.

      • getInstance

        public static ActiveProjectileManager getInstance()
        Gets the current projectile manager singleton being used.
        Returns:
        ActiveProjectileManager singleton.

      • init

        public void init()
        MUST be called once after the Stage is setup.

      • spawnLaser

        public void spawnLaser(float x,
                       float y)
        Spawns a laser at the desired x and y location. This includes a texture and Box2d body object.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of where to spawn the laser.
        y - the y-coordinate of where to spawn the laser.

      • poll

        public void poll()
        Polls for updates to any pooled projectile. This controls projectiles that need to be removed from the stage, or added to the Graveyard.

      • setStage

        public void setStage(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage)
        The stage MUST be set in order for the projectile manager to work properly.
        Parameters:
        stage - current stage being used on screen.

      • setWorld

        public void setWorld(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world)
        The world MUST be set in order for the projectile manager to work properly.
        Parameters:
        world - current world being used on screen.
